title: Boravenchy
author: Boravenchy
content: Hi all, Title is pretty self-explanatory. I'm looking to buy as much Rinkenby ETH as possible Pls DM offers - happy to do escrow for large amounts.

comments.author: saxydev
comments.body: Sent a message on discord, waiting on your offer

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: Boravenchy on May 25, 2022, 06:56:02 AMHi all, Title is pretty self-explanatory. I'm looking to buy as much Rinkenby ETH as possible Pls DM offers - happy to do escrow for large amounts. Isn’t this free? I’ll sell you some. PM me if you’re serious. Last time I checked you could still get this ETH for free so unless something has changed that I’m unaware of, that’s probably still the best way to get your hands on some. If you’re buying though, I’m selling.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Quote from: Boravenchy on May 25, 2022, 06:56:02 AMHi all, Title is pretty self-explanatory. I'm looking to buy as much Rinkenby ETH as possible Pls DM offers - happy to do escrow for large amounts. you can get it for free here https://faucets.chain.link/rinkeby

comments.author: saxydev
comments.body: Messaged him asking for 0.5$/ETH, which is very small price. Today he texted me that he needs goerli but he went unresponsive, not a serious dude, so avoid him.
